query:
SELECT 
  (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM tasks WHERE userId = 1 AND isActive = 1 AND frequency = 'daily') as daily_tasks,
  (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM tasks WHERE userId = 1 AND isActive = 1) as all_tasks,
  (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM task_completions WHERE userId = 1 AND DATE(date) = CURDATE()) as completions_today,
  (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM task_completions WHERE userId = 1 AND DATE(date) = CURDATE() AND status = 'done') as done_today
command:
mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway02.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user 33MFGxMifQW3kvU.695ec95cf178 --database jdYJzsjjq9oKQ4uf2Lq74q --execute SELECT 
  (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM tasks WHERE userId = 1 AND isActive = 1 AND frequency = 'daily') as daily_tasks,
  (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM tasks WHERE userId = 1 AND isActive = 1) as all_tasks,
  (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM task_completions WHERE userId = 1 AND DATE(date) = CURDATE()) as completions_today,
  (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM task_completions WHERE userId = 1 AND DATE(date) = CURDATE() AND status = 'done') as done_today
